body:
kubernetes pre-submit unit tests for `pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime` pass some times and fails some times causing the flakiness. Here is one such failure https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/44987/pull-kubernetes-unit/28850/?log#log

Passing:
```

root@s70553-HP-EliteBook-840-G2:~/gopath/src/k8s.io/kubernetes# make test WHAT="./pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime"
Running tests for APIVersion: v1,apps/v1beta1,authentication.k8s.io/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1,authorization.k8s.io/v1,authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,autoscaling/v1,autoscaling/v2alpha1,batch/v1,batch/v2alpha1,certificates.k8s.io/v1beta1,extensions/v1beta1,imagepolicy.k8s.io/v1alpha1,policy/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1alpha1,settings.k8s.io/v1alpha1,storage.k8s.io/v1beta1,storage.k8s.io/v1,federation/v1beta1
+++ [0503 17:58:43] Running tests without code coverage
ok  	k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime	0.124s
```
Failing:
```
root@s70553-HP-EliteBook-840-G2:~/gopath/src/k8s.io/kubernetes# make test WHAT="./pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime"
Running tests for APIVersion: v1,apps/v1beta1,authentication.k8s.io/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1,authorization.k8s.io/v1,authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,autoscaling/v1,autoscaling/v2alpha1,batch/v1,batch/v2alpha1,certificates.k8s.io/v1beta1,extensions/v1beta1,imagepolicy.k8s.io/v1alpha1,policy/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1alpha1,settings.k8s.io/v1alpha1,storage.k8s.io/v1beta1,storage.k8s.io/v1,federation/v1beta1
+++ [0503 17:56:10] Running tests without code coverage
--- FAIL: TestSandboxGC (0.00s)
	kuberuntime_gc_test.go:125: TestCase #0: {description:notready sandboxes without containers for deleted pods should be garbage collected. sandboxes:[{pod:0xc420023800 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:1}] containers:[] minAge:0 remain:[]}
	kuberuntime_gc_test.go:125: TestCase #1: {description:ready sandboxes without containers for deleted pods should not be garbage collected. sandboxes:[{pod:0xc420023800 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:0}] containers:[] minAge:0 remain:[0]}
	kuberuntime_gc_test.go:125: TestCase #2: {description:sandboxes for existing pods should not be garbage collected. sandboxes:[{pod:0xc420022f00 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:0} {pod:0xc420023200 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:1}] containers:[] minAge:0 remain:[0 1]}
	kuberuntime_gc_test.go:125: TestCase #3: {description:sandbox with containers should not be garbage collected. sandboxes:[{pod:0xc420022f00 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:1}] containers:[{pod:0xc420022f00 container:0xc4201ec780 sandboxAttempt:0 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:2}] minAge:0 remain:[0]}
	kuberuntime_gc_test.go:125: TestCase #4: {description:multiple sandboxes should be handled properly. sandboxes:[{pod:0xc420022f00 attempt:1 createdAt:0 state:0} {pod:0xc420022f00 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:1} {pod:0xc420023200 attempt:1 createdAt:0 state:1} {pod:0xc420023200 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:1} {pod:0xc420023800 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:1}] containers:[{pod:0xc420023200 container:0xc4201d17c0 sandboxAttempt:1 attempt:0 createdAt:0 state:2}] minAge:0 remain:[0 2]}
        Error Trace:    kuberuntime_gc_test.go:135
	Error:		"[&PodSandbox{Id:foo2_new_5678_1,Metadata:&PodSandboxMetadata{Name:foo2,Uid:5678,Namespace:new,Attempt:1,},State:SANDBOX_NOTREADY,CreatedAt:0,Labels:map[string]string{io.kubernetes.pod.name: foo2,io.kubernetes.pod.namespace: new,io.kubernetes.pod.uid: 5678,},Annotations:map[string]string{},} &PodSandbox{Id:foo2_new_5678_0,Metadata:&PodSandboxMetadata{Name:foo2,Uid:5678,Namespace:new,Attempt:0,},State:SANDBOX_NOTREADY,CreatedAt:0,Labels:map[string]string{io.kubernetes.pod.name: foo2,io.kubernetes.pod.namespace: new,io.kubernetes.pod.uid: 5678,},Annotations:map[string]string{},} &PodSandbox{Id:foo1_new_1234_1,Metadata:&PodSandboxMetadata{Name:foo1,Uid:1234,Namespace:new,Attempt:1,},State:SANDBOX_READY,CreatedAt:0,Labels:map[string]string{io.kubernetes.pod.name: foo1,io.kubernetes.pod.namespace: new,io.kubernetes.pod.uid: 1234,},Annotations:map[string]string{},}]" should have 2 item(s), but has 3
		
E0503 17:56:19.635869    6170 kuberuntime_manager.go:554] Couldn't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)": 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.636062    6170 image_manager.go:90] Couldn't make a ref to pod foo, container foo1: 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.636236    6170 kuberuntime_container.go:64] Can't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)", container foo1: selfLink was empty, can't make reference
E0503 17:56:19.636292    6170 image_manager.go:90] Couldn't make a ref to pod foo, container foo2: 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.636380    6170 kuberuntime_container.go:64] Can't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)", container foo2: selfLink was empty, can't make reference
E0503 17:56:19.639891    6170 kuberuntime_manager.go:554] Couldn't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)": 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.639929    6170 image_manager.go:90] Couldn't make a ref to pod foo, container init1: 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.640053    6170 kuberuntime_container.go:64] Can't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)", container init1: selfLink was empty, can't make reference
E0503 17:56:19.640194    6170 image_manager.go:90] Couldn't make a ref to pod foo, container foo1: 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.640286    6170 kuberuntime_container.go:64] Can't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)", container foo1: selfLink was empty, can't make reference
E0503 17:56:19.640317    6170 image_manager.go:90] Couldn't make a ref to pod foo, container foo2: 'selfLink was empty, can't make reference'
E0503 17:56:19.640415    6170 kuberuntime_container.go:64] Can't make a ref to pod "foo_new(12345678)", container foo2: selfLink was empty, can't make reference
FAIL
FAIL	k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime	0.121s
Makefile:164: recipe for target 'test' failed
make: *** [test] Error 1
```

cc @kubernetes/sig-node-bugs
title: flake in unit tests of pkg/kubelet/kuberuntime
